Yeah, this is basically a "2 wrongs don't make 1 right," scenario. Whereas 
the officer probably got a slap on the wrist for excessive force, the 
owners probably got slapped with a fine for animal negligence. Should the 
owners have chained them up, or caged them up better? Yes. Should the cop 
have shot it? Probably not but then you come into the thinking the "what 
ifs," this is where the officer will be seen in the right. What if the dogs
